column4: can someone help me with the disable touchpad button on an eeepc1005hab?
anybody, touchpad disabling help? eh? thank you in advacne
synclient TouchPadOff=1
it's a command line solution
doesnt do anything
works for me
did you edit it in xorg.conf?
the synclient binary is provided by  xserver-xorg-input-synaptics package
i don't have xorg.conf
you will have to enable SHMConfig
https://help.ubuntu.com/community/SynapticsTouchpad
oh ... so you mean the button on your laptop is not able to disable touchpad?
is it a single button or involves the combination... like FunctionKey + DisableTouchPadKey
ok
i don't know ... installing gsynaptics  might help
well.. i have a file > http://pastebin.com/UsKVXW3L
i think i found the solution with gsynaptics
wow
that's good :)
thanks alot man, i wouldnt have known to install that
np
